title: 8/24/17 - Write down what you believe in
description:
It's time to shutter the United Nations ...The world is being redesigned ...You won't recognize the world in 2022 ...'Chaos is our immediate future' ...What the media is saying about Donald Trump ...The press wants us to believe that they are more sane than the president ...What's the 'Goldwater Rule' and how is it used to destroy people ...TSA nightmare ...Google and Wal-Mart teaming up ...Wal-Mart really struggling? ...Introducing a grocery store named "Lidl" ...What is MoviePass.com and how does it work? ...8% of Americans believe this.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
